comments.body: The XML documentation summary tags contain extra '>' characters (e.g., '</summary>>'). This may lead to documentation parsing issues. Please remove the extraneous symbols to comply with standard XML tag syntax.
The XML documentation for the parameters shows an unexpected backslash and redundant closing markers. Ensure that the <param> tags are correctly formatted without extra characters.

The condition in the while loop for checking the mouse position relative to the button is incorrect. The second y-axis condition uses the same boundary (y + half the height) instead of subtracting half the height. Update the condition to 'mouseY > y - EscapeButton.Bounds.Height / 2' to properly check if the pointer is within the button bounds.
